title: Visual errors
content:
Across several websites, not very often however, I will come across a visual error where C will display across a function such as collapsible menus or other things.

It's not an addon at fault, and hard refreshing doesn't do anything either. I'd like to fix this. Please tell me how.

title: Font Rendering
content:
Hi all,

Last weekend Firefox updated to 82.02 automatically and the font is now very Chrome-like in that it is grey and grainy which causes me massive eye strain.

I switched from Chrome to Firefox because of the bolder, blacker fonts. Now I'm probably stuck in version 81 for the rest of time which is not a long term solution. Is there a way to use version 81 font rendering in updated versions of Firefox.

Thanks,

Jayule
creator: jayule

title: Keep two profiles' bookmarks in sync
content:
I want to have a unified bookmark experience over two different user accounts on my desktop computer (one is my 'ordinary' account, the other is the Administrator' account. Importing bookmarks is a one-time event, and entropy takes over immediately afterwards. It occurs to me that using a Shortcut, to point to a single file, may be a solution. The idea being that any change to the single file will automatically perpetuate itself to both accounts.

My question - is this reasonable, or is there an even niftier way of doing this (a sort of "Blend the properties for these two accounts" type of setting).

Thanks,

Tony
creator: tfurnivall

title: received no mail messages for days
content: Mail messages arriving at my mail server unina.it do not migrate anymore to my mozilla mail server. Should I review the migration codes?

title: Certain links just don't work.
content:
In attempting to access my Pinterest account to log in, I end up forced most times to use the Login with Google function, since that's what my Pinterest account is tied to. However, whenever I click the button that would bring up the window to let me sign in, the selection is unresponsive. Same thing with the Login with Facebook, since I tried it.

A similar thing happened a while ago with the Wacom website, where it wouldn't even bring up a login screen when I selected Login on the site.

There's no link attached to either of the selections, since right clicking doesn't bring up any "copy link location."

This is a Firefox specific problem, since I did not experience the issue with Microsoft Edge.

Anyone any suggestions?

title: Is there a way to prevent bookmarks from being duplicated when accessed?
content: Recently, I have encountered bookmarks duplicating when selected. They populate within the same folder. Is there some way that I can have only one instance of the same bookmark within a folder? Deleting the bookmarks is only temporary, on the next browser session launch they display again. I am using Sync, which otherwise is filing bookmarks correctly for devices associated with my account.

title: Ícones de arquivos "pdf" aparecem como documentos HTML
content: Desinstalei o Adobe Reader do meu computador (Windows 10) devido à alta ocupação da RAM. Prefiro utilizar o visualizador do Firefox, porém, ao escolher o Firefox como visualizador padrão de arquivos "pdf", os ícones do arquivo passaram a aparecer como documentos HTML no Windows Explorer, apesar de abrirem corretamente. Essa visualização errada no Windows Explorer confunde o usuário. Parece ser um bug do Firefox, pois há reclamações sobre este problema desde outras versões e ainda não solucionaram.

title: Firefox needs to be fully restarted in order for VPN to take effect
content:
I have a Palo Alto split tunnel VPN connection (using MacOS GlobalProtect application) and everytime I need to connect to the VPN I have to fully restart Firefox, by right clicking on the dock icon and choosing `Quit`.

If I don't do that all internal pages behave as if the VPN wasn't connected, either hanging until timing out or presenting me with an unauthorized page.

After a full restart, all pages open normally, using the VPN connection. This behaviour is not present in Chrome, which catches the VPN connection, throws an `ERR_NETWORK_CHANGED`, and, after refreshing the page, starts using the VPN connection normally.

I tried switching to offline mode back and forth, changing proxy settings back and forth, clearing DNS cache, none of which works for me, but a full restart.

I wonder if there is any workaround other than the full browser restart or if this is indeed a known bug that needs to be fixed.

Related issues:

https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1405307 https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=968273
creator: gchamon

title: Firefox profile issue: can't open Slack
content:
Hi,

When I launch my Slack workspace using Firefox, I obtain a fully white screen, with "about:blank" in the search bar (cf. screenshot).

It doesn't happen when I'm on Firefox with a private navigation, on Edge or Chrome, or when I use Slack app.

Slack support team assisted me on this issue resolution, and it happens the problem comes from my Firefox profile.

I created a new "test profile" and it works with it.

How can I solve out this problem: being able to use my current profile and connect on my Slack workspace?

Thanks in advance for your help.

Best, Nicolas
creator: nicolas.martinois

title: Güvenlik Açığı
content: [Menü - Tercihler - Gizlilik ve Güvenlik - Formlar ve Parolalar - Kayıtlı Hesaplar] penceresinde [Parolaları Göster] tuşuna tıkladığımda tüm kayıtlı parolalarım hemen ekrana geliyor. title: Transferring bookmarks & passwords from FF 81.0.2 on old pc to FF 78.4.0ESR on new PC
content: I have FF 81.0.2 running on a PC I'm replacing. I prefer ESR, since not so many upgrades. Installed 78.4.0ESR on the new PC & tried copying the contents of the 81 profile folder into the ESR profile folder, deleting all the content of the ESR profile folder 1st. When I try opening the ESR install, it tells me "profile contains old content, set up new profile." For the PW's, I tried copying & replacing key4.db, signons.sqlite & logins.json in the ESR profile, still no PW's or logins in the ESR. All I really need in the ESR from the 81 are the bookmarks (thousands) & passwords (about 400). There MUST be some way to do this! Thanks in advance!
